anya-e0102n3:2_1: ghānāyatanaṁ, gandhāyatanaṁ, jivhāyatanaṁ, rasāyatanaṁ, kāyāyatanaṁ, phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṁ,
anya-e0102n3:3: Attha lakkhaṇa tāvatva, kama saṅkhepa vitthārā;
anya-e0102n3:5_0: Tattha visesato tāva cakkhatīti cakkhu, rūpaṁ assādeti vibhāveti cāti attho. Rūpayatīti
anya-e0102n3:5_1: rūpaṁ, vaṇṇavikāraṁ āpajjamānaṁ hadayaṅgatabhāvaṁ pakāsetīti attho. Suṇātīti sotaṁ.
anya-e0102n3:5_2: Sappatīti saddo, udāhariyatīti attho. Ghāyatīti ghānaṁ. Gandhayatīti gandho. Attano
anya-e0102n3:5_3: vatthuṁ sūcayatīti attho. Jīvitaṁ avhayatīti jivhā. Rasanti taṁ sattāti raso, assādentīti
anya-e0102n3:5_4: attho. Kucchitānaṁ sāsavadhammānaṁ āyoti kāyo. Āyoti uppattideso. Phusiyatīti phoṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0102n3:5_5: Munātīti mano. Attano lakkhaṇaṁ dhārentīti dhammā.
anya-e0102n3:6_0: 511. Avisesato pana āyatanato, āyānaṁ tananato, āyatassa ca nayanato āyatananti veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0102n3:6_1: Cakkhurūpādīsu hi taṁtaṁdvārārammaṇā cittacetasikā dhammā sena sena anubhavanādinā
anya-e0102n3:6_2: kiccena āyatanti uṭṭhahanti ghaṭanti, vāyamantīti vuttaṁ hoti. Te ca āyabhūte dhamme
anya-e0102n3:6_3: etāni tanonti, vitthārentīti vuttaṁ hoti, idañca anamatagge saṁsāre pavattaṁ atīva
anya-e0102n3:6_4: āyataṁ saṁsāradukkhaṁ yāva na nivattati, tāva nayanteva, pavattayantīti vuttaṁ hoti.
anya-e0102n3:6_5: Iti sabbepime dhammā āyatanato, āyānaṁ tananato, āyatassa ca nayanato āyatanaṁ āyatananti vuccanti.
anya-e0102n3:7_1: kāraṇaṭṭhena ca āyatanaṁ veditabbaṁ. Tathā hi loke “issarāyatanaṁ vāsudevāyatana”ntiādīsu
anya-e0102n3:7_2: nivāsaṭṭhānaṁ āyatananti vuccati. “Suvaṇṇāyatanaṁ rajatāyatana”ntiādīsu ākaro. Sāsane
anya-e0102n3:7_3: pana “manoramme āyatane sevanti naṁ vihaṅgamā”tiādīsu samosaraṇaṭṭhānaṁ. “Dakkhiṇāpatho
anya-e0102n3:7_4: gunnaṁ āyatana”ntiādīsu sañjātideso. “Tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbataṁ pāpuṇāti sati
anya-e0102n3:8_0: Cakkhuādīsu cāpi te te cittacetasikā dhammā nivasanti tadāyattavuttitāyāti cakkhādayo
anya-e0102n3:8_1: ca nesaṁ nivāsaṭṭhānaṁ. Cakkhādīsu ca te ākiṇṇā tannissitattā tadārammaṇattā cāti
anya-e0102n3:8_2: cakkhādayo nesaṁ ākaro. Cakkhādayo ca nesaṁ samosaraṇaṭṭhānaṁ, tattha tattha vatthudvārārammaṇavasena
anya-e0102n3:8_3: samosaraṇato. Cakkhādayo ca nesaṁ sañjātideso, tannissayārammaṇabhāvena tattheva
anya-e0102n3:8_4: uppattito. Cakkhādayo ca nesaṁ kāraṇaṁ, tesaṁ abhāve abhāvatoti. Iti nivāsaṭṭhānaṭṭhena,
anya-e0102n3:8_6: kāraṇehi ete dhammā āyatanaṁ āyatananti vuccanti.
anya-e0102n3:9: Tasmā yathāvuttena atthena cakkhu ca taṁ āyatanañcāti cakkhāyatanaṁ…pe… dhammā ca te āyatanañcāti dhammāyatananti evaṁ tāvettha atthato viññātabbo vinicchayo.
anya-e0102n3:10: 513.Lakkhaṇāti cakkhādīnaṁ lakkhaṇatopettha viññātabbo vinicchayo. Tāni ca pana tesaṁ lakkhaṇāni khandhaniddese vuttanayeneva veditabbāni.
anya-e0102n3:11_0: Tāvatvatoti tāvabhāvato. Idaṁ vuttaṁ hoti – cakkhādayopi hi dhammā eva, evaṁ sati
anya-e0102n3:11_1: dhammāyatanamicceva avatvā kasmā dvādasāyatanānīti vuttānīti ce. Chaviññāṇakāyuppattidvārārammaṇavavatthānato
anya-e0102n3:11_2: idha channaṁ viññāṇakāyānaṁ dvārabhāvena ārammaṇabhāvena ca vavatthānato ayametesaṁ
anya-e0102n3:11_3: bhedo hotīti dvādasa vuttāni, cakkhuviññāṇavīthipariyāpannassa hi viññāṇakāyassa
anya-e0102n3:11_4: cakkhāyatanameva uppattidvāraṁ, rūpāyatanameva cārammaṇaṁ, tathā itarāni itaresaṁ.
anya-e0102n3:11_5: Chaṭṭhassa pana bhavaṅgamanasaṅkhāto manāyatanekadesova uppattidvāraṁ, asādhāraṇameva
anya-e0102n3:11_6: ca dhammāyatanaṁ ārammaṇanti. Iti channaṁ viññāṇakāyānaṁ uppattidvārārammaṇavavatthānato
anya-e0102n3:11_7: dvādasa vuttānīti evamettha tāvatvato viññātabbo vinicchayo.
anya-e0102n3:12_0: 514.Kamatoti idhāpi pubbe vuttesu uppattikkamādīsu desanākkamova yujjati. Ajjhattikesu
anya-e0102n3:12_1: hi āyatanesu sanidassanasappaṭighavisayattā cakkhāyatanaṁ pākaṭanti paṭhamaṁ desitaṁ,
anya-e0102n3:12_3: bahūpakārattā ajjhattikesu cakkhāyatanasotāyatanāni paṭhamaṁ desitāni, tato ghānāyatanādīni
anya-e0102n3:12_4: tīṇi, pañcannampi gocaravisayattā ante manāyatanaṁ, cakkhāyatanādīnaṁ pana gocarattā
anya-e0102n3:12_5: tassa tassa antarantarāni bāhiresu rūpāyatanādīni. Apica viññāṇuppattikāraṇavavatthānatopi
anya-e0102n3:12_6: ayametesaṁ kamo veditabbo. Vuttañhetaṁ “cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇaṁ…pe…
anya-e0102n3:12_7: manañca paṭicca dhamme ca uppajjati manoviññāṇa”nti. Evaṁ kamatopettha viññātabbo vinicchayo.
anya-e0102n3:13_0: 515.Saṅkhepavitthārāti saṅkhepato hi manāyatanassa ceva dhammāyatanekadesassa ca
anya-e0102n3:13_1: nāmena tadavasesānañca āyatanānaṁ rūpena saṅgahitattā dvādasāpi āyatanāni nāmarūpamattameva
anya-e0102n3:13_2: honti. Vitthārato pana ajjhattikesu tāva cakkhāyatanaṁ jātivasena cakkhupasādamattameva,
anya-e0102n3:13_3: paccayagatinikāyapuggalabhedato pana anantappabhedaṁ. Tathā sotāyatanādīni cattāri.
anya-e0102n3:13_8: sabhāvanānattabhedato anekappabhedanti. Evaṁ saṅkhepavitthārā viññātabbo vinicchayo.
anya-e0102n3:14_0: 516.Daṭṭhabbatoti ettha pana sabbāneva saṅkhatāni āyatanāni anāgamanato aniggamanato
anya-e0102n3:14_1: ca daṭṭhabbāni. Na hi tāni pubbe udayā kutoci āgacchanti, napi uddhaṁ vayā kuhiñci
anya-e0102n3:14_2: gacchanti, atha kho pubbe udayā appaṭiladdhasabhāvāni, uddhaṁ vayā paribhinnasabhāvāni,
anya-e0102n3:14_3: pubbantāparantavemajjhe paccayāyattavuttitāya avasāni pavattanti. Tasmā anāgamanato
anya-e0102n3:14_4: aniggamanato ca daṭṭhabbāni. Tathā nirīhakato abyāpārato ca. Na hi cakkhurūpādīnaṁ
anya-e0102n3:14_5: evaṁ hoti “aho vata amhākaṁ sāmaggiyaṁ viññāṇaṁ nāma uppajjeyyā”ti, na ca tāni viññāṇuppādanatthaṁ
anya-e0102n3:14_6: dvārabhāvena vatthubhāvena ārammaṇabhāvena vā īhanti, na byāpāramāpajjanti, atha
anya-e0102n3:14_7: kho dhammatāvesā, yaṁ cakkhurūpādisāmaggiyaṁ cakkhuviññāṇādīni sambhavantīti. Tasmā
anya-e0102n3:14_8: nirīhakato abyāpārato ca daṭṭhabbāni. Apica ajjhattikāni suññagāmo viya daṭṭhabbāni,
anya-e0102n3:14_10: abhighātakattā. Vuttañhetaṁ “cakkhu, bhikkhave, haññati manāpāmanāpehi rūpehī”ti
anya-e0102n3:14_11: vitthāro. Apica ajjhattikāni cha pāṇakā viya daṭṭhabbāni, bāhirāni tesaṁ gocarā viyāti.
anya-e0102n3:17_0: 517. Tadanantarā pana dhātuyoti aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo – cakkhudhātu, rūpadhātu, cakkhuviññāṇadhātu,
anya-e0102n3:17_1: sotadhātu, saddadhātu, sotaviññāṇadhātu, ghānadhātu, gandhadhātu, ghānaviññāṇadhātu,
anya-e0102n3:17_2: jivhādhātu, rasadhātu, jivhāviññāṇadhātu, kāyadhātu, phoṭṭhabbadhātu, kāyaviññāṇadhātu,
anya-e0102n3:20_0: Tattha atthatoti cakkhatīti cakkhu. Rūpayatīti rūpaṁ. Cakkhussa viññāṇaṁ cakkhuviññāṇanti
anya-e0102n3:20_1: evamādinā tāva nayena cakkhādīnaṁ visesatthato veditabbo vinicchayo. Avisesena pana
anya-e0102n3:20_2: vidahati, dhīyate, vidhānaṁ, vidhīyate etāya, ettha vā dhīyatīti dhātu. Lokiyā hi
anya-e0102n3:20_3: dhātuyo kāraṇabhāvena vavatthitā hutvā suvaṇṇarajatādidhātuyo viya suvaṇṇarajatādiṁ,
anya-e0102n3:20_4: anekappakāraṁ saṁsāradukkhaṁ vidahanti. Bhārahārehi ca bhāro viya, sattehi dhīyante,
anya-e0102n3:20_5: dhāriyantīti attho. Dukkhavidhānamattameva cesā, avasavattanato. Etāhi ca karaṇabhūtāhi
anya-e0102n3:20_6: saṁsāradukkhaṁ sattehi anuvidhīyati. Tathāvihitañca taṁ etāsveva dhīyati, ṭhapiyatīti
anya-e0102n3:20_7: attho. Iti cakkhādīsu ekeko dhammo yathāsambhavaṁ vidahati, dhīyatītiādinā atthavasena dhātūti vuccati.
anya-e0102n3:21_0: 518. Apica yathā titthiyānaṁ attā nāma sabhāvato natthi, na evametā, etā pana attano
anya-e0102n3:21_1: sabhāvaṁ dhārentīti dhātuyo. Yathā loke vicittā haritālamanosilādayo selāvayavā dhātuyoti
anya-e0102n3:21_2: vuccanti, evametāpi dhātuyo viya dhātuyo. Vicittā hete ñāṇañeyyāvayavāti. Yathā vā
anya-e0102n3:21_4: dhātusamaññā, evametesupi pañcakkhandhasaṅkhātassa attabhāvassa avayavesu dhātusamaññā
anya-e0102n3:21_5: veditabbā. Aññamaññavisabhāgalakkhaṇaparicchinnā hete cakkhādayoti. Apica dhātūti
anya-e0102n3:21_6: nijjīvamattassevetaṁ adhivacanaṁ. Tathā hi bhagavā “cha dhāturo ayaṁ bhikkhu puriso”tiādīsu
anya-e0102n3:22: Tasmā yathāvuttena atthena cakkhu ca taṁ dhātu ca cakkhudhātu…pe… manoviññāṇañca taṁ dhātu ca manoviññāṇadhātūti. Evaṁ tāvettha atthato veditabbo vinicchayo.
anya-e0102n3:23: 519.Lakkhaṇāditoti cakkhādīnaṁ lakkhaṇāditopettha veditabbo vinicchayo. Tāni ca pana nesaṁ lakkhaṇādīni khandhaniddese vuttanayeneva veditabbāni.
anya-e0102n3:24_0: Kamatoti idhāpi pubbe vuttesu uppattikkamādīsu desanākkamova yujjati. So ca panāyaṁ
anya-e0102n3:24_1: hetuphalānupubbavavatthānavasena vutto. Cakkhudhātu rūpadhātūti idañhi dvayaṁ hetu,
anya-e0102n3:25_0: 520.Tāvatvatoti tāvabhāvato. Idaṁ vuttaṁ hoti – tesu tesu hi suttābhidhammappadesesu
anya-e0102n3:25_7: “anekadhātu nānādhātu loko”ti evamādayo aññāpi dhātuyo dissanti. Evaṁ sati sabbāsaṁ
anya-e0102n3:25_8: vasena paricchedaṁ akatvā kasmā aṭṭhārasāti ayameva paricchedo katoti ce. Sabhāvato
anya-e0102n3:26_0: Rūpadhātuyeva hi ābhādhātu, subhadhātu pana rūpādipaṭibaddhā. Kasmā, subhanimittattā.
anya-e0102n3:26_1: Subhanimittañhi subhadhātu. Tañca rūpādivinimuttaṁ na vijjati. Kusalavipākārammaṇā
anya-e0102n3:26_2: vā rūpādayo eva subhadhātūti rūpādimattamevesā. Ākāsānañcāyatanadhātuādīsu cittaṁ
anya-e0102n3:26_3: manoviññāṇadhātuyeva, sesā dhammadhātu. Saññāvedayitanirodhadhātu pana sabhāvato
anya-e0102n3:27_0: Kāmadhātu dhammadhātumattaṁ vā hoti. Yathāha – “tattha katamā kāmadhātu? Kāmapaṭisaṁyutto
anya-e0102n3:27_1: takko vitakko micchāsaṅkappo”ti. Aṭṭhārasāpi vā dhātuyo. Yathāha – “heṭṭhato avīcinirayaṁ
anya-e0102n3:27_2: pariyantaṁ karitvā uparito paranimmitavasavattī deve antokaritvā yaṁ etasmiṁ antare
anya-e0102n3:27_3: etthāvacarā ettha pariyāpannā khandhadhātuāyatanā rūpā vedanā saññā saṅkhārā viññāṇaṁ,
anya-e0102n3:28_0: Nekkhammadhātu dhammadhātu eva, “sabbepi kusalā dhammā nekkhammadhātū”ti vacanato
anya-e0102n3:29_0: Hīnamajjhimapaṇītadhātuyo aṭṭhārasa dhātumattameva. Hīnā hi cakkhādayo hīnā dhātu,
anya-e0102n3:29_1: majjhimapaṇītā majjhimā ceva paṇītā ca. Nippariyāyena pana akusalā dhammadhātumanoviññāṇadhātuyo
anya-e0102n3:29_2: hīnadhātu, lokiyā kusalābyākatā ubhopi cakkhudhātuādayo ca majjhimadhātu, lokuttarā
anya-e0102n3:30: Pathavītejovāyodhātuyo phoṭṭhabbadhātuyeva, āpodhātu ākāsadhātu ca dhammadhātuyeva. Viññāṇadhātu cakkhuviññāṇādisattaviññāṇadhātusaṅkhepoyeva.
anya-e0102n3:31_0: Sattarasa dhātuyo dhammadhātuekadeso ca saṅkhatadhātu, asaṅkhatā pana dhātu dhammadhātuekadesova.
anya-e0102n3:31_1: Anekadhātunānādhātuloko pana aṭṭhārasa dhātuppabhedamattamevāti. Iti sabhāvato vijjamānānaṁ
anya-e0102n3:32_0: 521. Apica vijānanasabhāve viññāṇe jīvasaññīnaṁ saññāsamūhananatthampi aṭṭhāraseva
anya-e0102n3:32_1: vuttā. Santi hi sattā vijānanasabhāve viññāṇe jīvasaññino, tesaṁ cakkhusotaghānajivhākāyamanodhātumanoviññāṇadhātubhedena
anya-e0102n3:32_2: tassa anekataṁ cakkhurūpādipaccayāyattavuttitāya aniccatañca pakāsetvā dīgharattānusayitaṁ
anya-e0102n3:32_3: jīvasaññaṁ samūhanitukāmena bhagavatā aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo pakāsitā. Kiñca bhiyyo tathā
anya-e0102n3:32_4: veneyyajjhāsayavasena ca. Ye ca imāya anatisaṅkhepavitthārāya desanāya veneyyasattā,
anya-e0102n3:38_0: 522.Saṅkhatoti cakkhudhātu tāva jātito eko dhammotveva saṅkhaṁ gacchati cakkhupasādavasena,
anya-e0102n3:38_2: pana pathavītejovāyovasena tayo dhammāti saṅkhaṁ gacchati. Cakkhuviññāṇadhātu kusalākusalavipākavasena
anya-e0102n3:38_3: dve dhammāti saṅkhaṁ gacchati, tathā sotaghānajivhākāyaviññāṇadhātuyo. Manodhātu
anya-e0102n3:38_5: gacchati. Dhammadhātu tiṇṇaṁ arūpakkhandhānaṁ soḷasannaṁ sukhumarūpānaṁ asaṅkhatāya
anya-e0102n3:38_6: ca dhātuyā vasena vīsati dhammāti saṅkhaṁ gacchati. Manoviññāṇadhātu sesakusalākusalābyākataviññāṇavasena
anya-e0102n3:38_7: chasattati dhammāti saṅkhaṁ gacchati. Evamettha saṅkhatopi veditabbo vinicchayo.
anya-e0102n3:39_1: vasena chahi paccayehi paccayo hoti, rūpadhātu purejātaatthiavigatārammaṇapaccayānaṁ
anya-e0102n3:39_2: vasena catūhi paccayehi paccayo hoti. Evaṁ sotaviññāṇadhātuādīnaṁ sotadhātusaddadhātuādayo.
anya-e0102n3:39_4: pañcahi paccayehi paccayo hoti, tā ca pañcapi sampaṭicchanamanodhātuyā. Tathā sampaṭicchanamanodhātu
anya-e0102n3:39_6: ca javanamanoviññāṇadhātuyā. Javanamanoviññāṇadhātu pana anantarāya javanamanoviññāṇadhātuyā
anya-e0102n3:39_7: tehi ceva pañcahi āsevanapaccayena cāti chahi paccayehi paccayo hoti. Esa tāva pañcadvāre nayo.
anya-e0102n3:40_1: ca javanamanoviññāṇadhātuyā purimehi pañcahi paccayehi paccayo hoti. Dhammadhātu
anya-e0102n3:40_3: bahudhā paccayo hoti. Cakkhudhātuādayo pana ekaccā ca dhammadhātu ekaccāya manoviññāṇadhātuyā
anya-e0102n3:40_4: ārammaṇapaccayādīhipi paccayā honti. Cakkhuviññāṇadhātuādīnañca na kevalaṁ cakkhurūpādayo
anya-e0102n3:40_5: paccayā honti, atha kho ālokādayopi. Tenāhu pubbācariyā –
anya-e0102n3:41_1: paṭicca uppajjati sotaviññāṇaṁ. Ghānagandhavāyumanasikāre paṭicca uppajjati ghānaviññāṇaṁ.
anya-e0102n3:41_3: paṭicca uppajjati kāyaviññāṇaṁ. Bhavaṅgamanadhammamanasikāre paṭicca uppajjati manoviññāṇa”nti.
anya-e0102n3:42: Ayamettha saṅkhepo. Vitthārato pana paccayappabhedo paṭiccasamuppādaniddese āvibhavissatīti evamettha paccayatopi veditabbo vinicchayo.
anya-e0102n3:43_0: 524.Daṭṭhabbatoti daṭṭhabbatopettha vinicchayo veditabboti attho. Sabbā eva hi saṅkhatadhātuyo
anya-e0102n3:44_0: Visesato panettha bheritalaṁ viya cakkhudhātu daṭṭhabbā, daṇḍo viya rūpadhātu, saddo
anya-e0102n3:44_1: viya cakkhuviññāṇadhātu. Tathā ādāsatalaṁ viya cakkhudhātu, mukhaṁ viya rūpadhātu,
anya-e0102n3:44_2: mukhanimittaṁ viya cakkhuviññāṇadhātu. Atha vā ucchutilā viya cakkhudhātu, yantacakkayaṭṭhi
anya-e0102n3:44_3: viya rūpadhātu, ucchurasatelāni viya cakkhuviññāṇadhātu. Tathā adharāraṇī viya cakkhudhātu,
anya-e0102n3:44_4: uttarāraṇī viya rūpadhātu, aggi viya cakkhuviññāṇadhātu. Esa nayo sotadhātuādīsu.
anya-e0102n3:45: Manodhātu pana yathāsambhavato cakkhuviññāṇadhātuādīnaṁ purecarānucarā viya daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0102n3:46_0: Dhammadhātuyā vedanākkhandho sallamiva sūlamiva ca daṭṭhabbo. Saññāsaṅkhārakkhandhā
anya-e0102n3:46_1: vedanāsallasūlayogāāturā viya, puthujjanānaṁ vā saññā āsādukkhajananato rittamuṭṭhi
anya-e0102n3:46_2: viya. Ayathābhuccanimittagāhakato vanamigo viya. Saṅkhārā paṭisandhiyaṁ pakkhipanato
anya-e0102n3:46_3: aṅgārakāsuyaṁ khipanakapurisā viya. Jāti dukkhānubandhato rājapurisānubandhacorā
anya-e0102n3:46_4: viya. Sabbānatthāvahassa khandhasantānassa hetuto visarukkhabījāni viya. Rūpaṁ nānāvidhupaddavanimittato
anya-e0102n3:46_5: khuracakkaṁ viya daṭṭhabbaṁ. Asaṅkhatā pana dhātu amatato santato khemato ca daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0102n3:47_0: Manoviññāṇadhātu ārammaṇesu vavatthānābhāvato araññamakkaṭo viya, duddamanato assakhaḷuṅko
